PERSONA:
meet arthur thompson, a 72-year-old retired librarian living in the heart of chicago, illinois, in the east north central division of the midwest. as a native-born american, arthur has spent his entire life in the united states and identifies as a white non-hispanic male. with a college degree in english literature and some postgraduate credits, arthur has always valued education and its impact on personal growth.

arthur never married and has a relatively modest life, living alone in a cozy apartment near the city library where he worked for over three decades. his annual income is around $45,000, which allows him to live comfortably within the middle-income tier. he has been a registered voter for most of his life and actively participates in local elections, aligning with the democratic party and holding liberal views on various social issues.

arthur's faith is rooted in protestantism, although he doesn't consider himself born-again or evangelical. he occasionally attends church services a few times a year, mostly on significant holidays or when his friends invite him to join their family gatherings. arthur is an avid reader and enjoys exploring various topics online, which he does several times a day. he uses the internet to stay informed about current events, read news articles, and engage in discussions on social media platforms.

despite his age, arthur is actively engaged in his community, often volunteering at local charities, participating in neighborhood events, and advocating for social causes that resonate with him. he is particularly passionate about education and literacy, often donating his time to support programs that promote reading and learning among underprivileged children.

arthur values his independence and is proud of his self-sufficient lifestyle. he spends his free time reading, watching documentaries, and taking long walks along lake michigan, cherishing the beauty of the city he calls home.
